Pre-Game Insights: Bebé, Steven Moreira, Roberto Lopes and Jovane Cabral should be back in the starting XI to be named by head coach Bubista.
Amir Abdou is likely to deploy once again the 4-1-4-1 formation and the same group of players.
Cape Verde are likely to take on either Morocco or South Africa in the 2023 AFCON quarter-finals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The nation of ten islands are undefeated in the 2023 AFCON while Mauritania recorded its first victory last time out against 2019 AFCON winners, Algeria.
The winner will face either Morocco or South Africa in the quarter-finals.
Others: The predicted Cape Verde lineup includes Vozinha, Moreira, Costa, Lopes, Fernandes; Duarte, Pina, Monteiro; Mendes, Bebé, Cabral.
The predicted Mauritania lineup includes Niasse, Keita, Dellah Yaly, L. Ba, Diaw; Gassama; Amar, Thiam, Mouhsine, Koita; Anne.
